20  ArBurgEstimator::ArBurgEstimator(unsigned int ArOrder)
21  :
22  mArOrder(ArOrder + 1),
23  mParcor(mArOrder),
24  mAR(mArOrder),
25  mErrorForward(mArOrder),
26  mErrorBackward(mArOrder) {
27  }
28 
29  ArBurgEstimator::~ArBurgEstimator() {
30  }
31 
32  void ArBurgEstimator::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData, SeqViewDouble& WhitenedData) {
33  Dmatrix* in = InputData.GetData();
34  Dmatrix* out = WhitenedData.GetData();
35 
36  if ((in->size1() != out->size1()) || (in->size2() != out->size2())) {
37  out->resize(in->size1(), in->size2());
38  LogWarning("ArBurgEstimator: resizing output view");
39  }
40  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
41  LogInfo("ArBurgEstimator: execute starts");
42  execute(row(*in, r));
43  LogInfo("ArBurgEstimator: execute ends");
44  }
45 
46  WhitenedData.SetStart(InputData.GetStart());
47  WhitenedData.SetSampling(InputData.GetSampling());
48 
49  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
50  row(*out, r) = mWhitenedData;
51  }
52  }
53 
54  void ArBurgEstimator::Color(SeqViewDouble& WhitenedData, SeqViewDouble& ColoredData) {
55  Dmatrix* in = WhitenedData.GetData();
56  Dmatrix* out = ColoredData.GetData();
57 
58  if ((in->size1() != out->size1()) || (in->size2() != out->size2())) {
59  out->resize(in->size1(), in->size2());
60  LogWarning("ArBurgEstimator: resizing output view");
61  }
62  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
63  color(row(*in, r), row(*out, r));
64  }
65 
66  ColoredData.SetStart(WhitenedData.GetStart());
67  ColoredData.SetSampling(WhitenedData.GetSampling());
68  }

70  void ArBurgEstimator::operator()(SeqViewDouble& InputData) {
71  Dmatrix* in = InputData.GetData();
72  for (unsigned int r = 0; r < in->size1(); r++) {
73  LogInfo("ArBurgEstimator: execute starts");
74  execute(row(*in, r));
75  LogInfo("ArBurgEstimator: execute ends");
76  }
77  }
78 
79  void ArBurgEstimator::execute(matrix_row<Dmatrix> InputData) {
80 
81  Dvector ErrorBackward(InputData.size() + 1);
82  Dvector ErrorForward(InputData.size() + 1);
83  Dvector tmpP(mArOrder);
84 
85  mWhitenedData.resize(InputData.size());
86 
87  double Norm;
88  double num;
89  double den;
90  Norm = 0.0;
91  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < InputData.size(); j++)
92  Norm += InputData(j) * InputData(j);
93 
94 
95  mParcor(0) = Norm / (double) (InputData.size());
96  mAR(0) = mParcor(0);
97  ErrorForward(0) = InputData(0);
98  ErrorBackward(InputData.size() - 1) = InputData(InputData.size() - 1);
99 
100  for (unsigned int j = 1; j < InputData.size(); j++) {
101  ErrorForward(j) = InputData(j);
102  ErrorBackward(j - 1) = InputData(j);
103  }
104 
105 
106  for (unsigned int k = 1; k < mArOrder; k++) {
107  num = 0.0;
108  den = 0.0;
109 
110  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < (InputData.size() - k); j++) {
111  num += ErrorForward(j) * ErrorBackward(j);
112  den += (ErrorForward(j) * ErrorForward(j) + ErrorBackward(j) * ErrorBackward(j));
113  }
114 
115  mAR(k) = 2.0 * num / den;
116  mParcor(k) = mAR(k);
117  mAR(0) *= (1.0 - mAR(k) * mAR(k));
118 
119  for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= (k - 1); i++) {
120  mAR(i) = tmpP(i) - mAR(k) * tmpP(k - i);
121  }
122  for (unsigned int i = 1; i <= k; i++)
123  tmpP(i) = mAR(i);
124 
125  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < (InputData.size() - k); j++) {
126  ErrorForward(j) -= tmpP(k) * ErrorBackward(j);
127  ErrorBackward(j) = ErrorBackward(j + 1) - tmpP(k) * ErrorForward(j + 1);
128  }
129 
130  }
131  mAR(0) = sqrt(mAR(0));
132  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mArOrder; j++) {
133  mErrorForward(j) = ErrorForward(j);
134  mErrorBackward(j) = ErrorBackward(j);
135  }
136 
137  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < InputData.size(); j++)
138  mWhitenedData(j) = ErrorForward(j);
139 
140  }
141 
142  void ArBurgEstimator::color(matrix_row<Dmatrix> WhitenedData, matrix_row<Dmatrix> ColoredData) {
143 
144 
145  mColoredData.resize(WhitenedData.size(), false);
146  mColoredData(0) = WhitenedData(0);
147 
148  for (unsigned int j = 1; j < mArOrder; j++) {
149  double sum = 0.0;
150  for (unsigned int k = 1; k <= j; k++)
151  sum += mAR(k) * mColoredData(j - k);
152 
153  mColoredData(j) = sum + WhitenedData(j);
154 
155  }
156  for (unsigned int j = mArOrder; j < WhitenedData.size(); j++) {
157  double sum = 0.0;
158  for (unsigned int k = 1; k <= j; k++)
159  sum += mAR(k) * mColoredData(j - k);
160 
161  mColoredData(j) = sum + WhitenedData(j);
162 
163  }
164  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < WhitenedData.size(); j++)
165  ColoredData(j) = mColoredData(j);
166  }
167 
168  void ArBurgEstimator::GetLatticeView(LatticeView& LV) {
169  if (LV.GetOrder() != GetArOrder()) {
170  LV.SetOrder(GetArOrder());
171  LV.GetParcorF()->resize(GetArOrder() + 1);
172  LV.GetParcorB()->resize(GetArOrder() + 1);
173  LV.GetErrorForward()->resize(2, GetArOrder() + 1);
174  LV.GetErrorBackward()->resize(2, GetArOrder() + 1);
175  LogWarning("ArBurgEstimator: resizing Lattice view order");
176  }
177  for (unsigned int i = 0; i <= LV.GetOrder(); i++) {
178  LV.SetParcorF(i, GetParcor(i));
179  LV.SetParcorB(i, GetParcor(i));
180  LV.SetErrorForward(i, GetErrorForward(i));
181  LV.SetErrorBackward(i, GetErrorBackward(i));
182  }
183  }
184 
185  unsigned int ArBurgEstimator::GetArOrder() {
186  return (mArOrder - 1);
187  }
188 
189  double ArBurgEstimator::GetParcor(unsigned int j) {

197  double ArBurgEstimator::GetErrorForward(unsigned int j) {

207  void ArBurgEstimator::SetArOrder(unsigned int P) {
208  mArOrder = P + 1;
209  }
210 
211  void ArBurgEstimator::SetAR(unsigned int j, double value) {
212  mAR(j) = value;
213  }
